issue.title: [CF 7] UI movement.
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.58, Microsoft Windows NT 6.0.6002 Service Pack 2

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 1.1.2

Description

When I exit the game and re-enter it later, the UI or the different bars will be moved around. It changes to much and frequently that eventually some of the bars completly moved off my screen and I can no longer see it.

Installed Addons

Atlasloot Enhanced - v5.09.05 Cartographer - v2.5.6 Cartographer 3.0 - v0.11.2 CurseProfiler 2.0 - v47 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.40-r3317 DrainSoulTimer - DrainSoulTimer2.1 ForteXorcist - v1.957 Gatherer - Gatherer 3.1.14 GearScore - GearScore 3.1.14 - Release MapCoords - 0.7 OPie - Foxtrot 2 QuestHelper - 1.3.9 Recount - v3.3g release TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 1.1.2


> Posted by CurseForge user kahknow | Imported from CurseForge issue #7 | Raw

comments.body:
this has happened to me occasionally although for me they always get moved to the upper left of the screen. A button to reset each bar's location is high on my priority list as an intermediate work around.

Fixing the problem at the source will be more difficult because at this point i don't know what's causing the problem. Probably some unavoidable RNG to do with how WoW only saves data for an addon when you logoff properly.


> Posted by CurseForge user TheAtomicOption
